006package gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup;
007
008import com.ctc.wstx.api.WstxOutputProperties;
009import com.ctc.wstx.stax.WstxOutputFactory;
010import com.vladsch.flexmark.formatter.Formatter;
011import com.vladsch.flexmark.html2md.converter.FlexmarkHtmlConverter;
012import com.vladsch.flexmark.parser.Parser;
013import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.Document;
014import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.Node;
015import com.vladsch.flexmark.util.ast.TextCollectingVisitor;
016
017import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.AstCollectingVisitor;
018import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.FlexmarkFactory;
019import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.IMarkupVisitor;
020import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.IMarkupWriter;
021import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.InsertAnchorExtension;
022import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.InsertAnchorExtension.InsertAnchorNode;
023import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.MarkupVisitor;
024import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.MarkupXmlEventWriter;
025import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.datatype.markup.flexmark.MarkupXmlStreamWriter;
026import gov.nist.secauto.metaschema.core.util.ObjectUtils;
027
028import org.apache.logging.log4j.LogManager;
029import org.apache.logging.log4j.Logger;
030import org.codehaus.stax2.XMLOutputFactory2;
031import org.codehaus.stax2.XMLStreamWriter2;
032import org.codehaus.stax2.evt.XMLEventFactory2;
033import org.jsoup.Jsoup;
034import org.jsoup.nodes.TextNode;
035import org.jsoup.select.NodeTraversor;
036import org.jsoup.select.NodeVisitor;
037
038import java.io.ByteArrayOutputStream;
039import java.io.IOException;
040import java.nio.charset.StandardCharsets;
041import java.util.List;
042import java.util.function.Predicate;
043import java.util.regex.Pattern;
044import java.util.stream.Stream;
045import java.util.stream.StreamSupport;
046
047import javax.xml.stream.XMLEventWriter;
048import javax.xml.stream.XMLOutputFactory;
049import javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamException;
050import javax.xml.stream.XMLStreamWriter;
051
052import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.NonNull;
053import edu.umd.cs.findbugs.annotations.Nullable;
054
055@SuppressWarnings("PMD.CouplingBetweenObjects")
056public abstract class AbstractMarkupString<TYPE extends AbstractMarkupString<TYPE>>
057    implements IMarkupString<TYPE> {
058  private static final Logger LOGGER = LogManager.getLogger(FlexmarkFactory.class);
059
060  private static final Pattern QUOTE_TAG_REPLACEMENT_PATTERN
061      = Pattern.compile("</?q>");
062
063  //
064  // @NonNull
065  // private static final String DEFAULT_HTML_NS = "http://www.w3.org/1999/xhtml";
066  // @NonNull
067  // private static final String DEFAULT_HTML_PREFIX = "";
068
069  @NonNull
070  private final Document document;
071
072  /**
073   * Construct a new markup string based on the provided flexmark AST graph.
074   *
075   * @param document
076   *          the AST graph representing Markdown text
077   */
078  protected AbstractMarkupString(@NonNull Document document) {
079    this.document = document;
080  }
081
082  @Override
083  public Document getDocument() {
084    return document;
085  }
086
087  @Override
088  public boolean isEmpty() {
089    return getDocument().getFirstChild() == null;
090  }
091
092  /**
093   * Parse HTML-based text into markdown as a flexmark AST graph.
094   * <p>
095   * This method uses a two-step approach that first translates the HTML into
096   * markdown, and then parses the markdown into an AST graph.
097   *
098   * @param html
099   *          the HTML text to parse
100   * @param htmlParser
101   *          the HTML parser used to produce markdown
102   * @param markdownParser
103   *          the markdown parser
104   * @return the markdown AST graph
105   */
106  @NonNull
107  protected static Document parseHtml(@NonNull String html, @NonNull FlexmarkHtmlConverter htmlParser,
108      @NonNull Parser markdownParser) {
109    org.jsoup.nodes.Document document = Jsoup.parse(html);
110
111    // Fix for usnistgov/liboscal-java#5
112    // Caused by not stripping out extra newlines inside HTML tags
113    NodeTraversor.traverse(new NodeVisitor() {
114
115      @Override
116      public void head(org.jsoup.nodes.Node node, int depth) {
117        if (node instanceof TextNode) {
118          TextNode textNode = (TextNode) node;
119
120          org.jsoup.nodes.Node parent = textNode.parent();
121
122          if (!isTag(parent, "code") || !isTag(parent.parent(), "pre")) {
123            node.replaceWith(new TextNode(textNode.text()));
124          }
125        }
126      }
127
128      private boolean isTag(@Nullable org.jsoup.nodes.Node node, @NonNull String tagName) {
129        return node != null && tagName.equals(node.normalName());
130      }
131
132    }, document);
133
134    String markdown = htmlParser.convert(document);
135    assert markdown != null;
136    if (LOGGER.isDebugEnabled()) {
137      LOGGER.debug("html->markdown: {}", markdown);
138    }
139    return parseMarkdown(markdown, markdownParser);
140  }
141
142  /**
143   * Parse markdown-based text into a flexmark AST graph.
144   *
145   * @param markdown
146   *          the markdown text to parse
147   * @param parser
148   *          the markdown parser
149   * @return the markdown AST graph
150   */
151  @SuppressWarnings("null")
152  @NonNull
153  protected static Document parseMarkdown(@NonNull String markdown, @NonNull Parser parser) {
154    return parser.parse(markdown);
155  }
156
157  @Override
158  public String toXHtml(@NonNull String namespace) throws XMLStreamException, IOException {
159
160    String retval;
161
162    Document document = getDocument();
163    if (document.hasChildren()) {
164
165      XMLOutputFactory2 factory = (XMLOutputFactory2) XMLOutputFactory.newInstance();
166      assert factory instanceof WstxOutputFactory;
167      factory.setProperty(WstxOutputProperties.P_OUTPUT_VALIDATE_STRUCTURE, false);
168      try (ByteArrayOutputStream os = new ByteArrayOutputStream()) {
169        XMLStreamWriter2 xmlStreamWriter = (XMLStreamWriter2) factory.createXMLStreamWriter(os);
170
171        writeXHtml(namespace, ObjectUtils.notNull(xmlStreamWriter));
172
173        xmlStreamWriter.flush();
174        xmlStreamWriter.close();
175        os.flush();
176        retval = ObjectUtils.notNull(os.toString(StandardCharsets.UTF_8));
177      }
178    } else {
179      retval = "";
180    }
181    return retval;
182  }
183
184  @Override
185  public String toHtml() {
186    // String html;
187    // try {
188    // html = toXHtml("");
189    // } catch(RuntimeException ex) {
190    // throw ex;
191    // } catch (Throwable ex) {
192    // throw new RuntimeException(ex);
193    // }
194    // return QUOTE_TAG_REPLACEMENT_PATTERN.matcher(html)
195    // .replaceAll("&quot;");
196    String html = getFlexmarkFactory().getHtmlRenderer().render(getDocument());
197    return ObjectUtils.notNull(QUOTE_TAG_REPLACEMENT_PATTERN.matcher(html)
198        .replaceAll("&quot;"));
199  }
200
201  @Override
202  public String toMarkdown() {
203    return toMarkdown(getFlexmarkFactory().getFormatter());
204  }
205
206  @Override
207  public String toMarkdown(Formatter formatter) {
208    return ObjectUtils.notNull(formatter.render(getDocument()));
209  }
210
211  @Override
212  public String toText() {
213    return ObjectUtils.notNull(new TextCollectingVisitor().collectAndGetText(document));
214  }
215
216  @Override
217  public void writeXHtml(String namespace, XMLStreamWriter2 streamWriter) throws XMLStreamException {
218    Document document = getDocument();
219    if (document.hasChildren()) {
220      IMarkupWriter<XMLStreamWriter, XMLStreamException> writer = new MarkupXmlStreamWriter(
221          namespace,
222          getFlexmarkFactory().getListOptions(),
223          streamWriter);
224
225      IMarkupVisitor<XMLStreamWriter, XMLStreamException> visitor = new MarkupVisitor<>(isBlock());
226      visitor.visitDocument(document, writer);
227    } else {
228      streamWriter.writeCharacters("");
229    }
230  }
231
232  @Override
233  public void writeXHtml(String namespace, XMLEventFactory2 eventFactory, XMLEventWriter eventWriter)
234      throws XMLStreamException {
235    Document document = getDocument();
236    if (document.hasChildren()) {
237
238      IMarkupWriter<XMLEventWriter, XMLStreamException> writer = new MarkupXmlEventWriter(
239          namespace,
240          getFlexmarkFactory().getListOptions(),
241          eventWriter,
242          eventFactory);
243
244      IMarkupVisitor<XMLEventWriter, XMLStreamException> visitor = new MarkupVisitor<>(isBlock());
245      visitor.visitDocument(getDocument(), writer);
246    } else {
247      eventWriter.add(eventFactory.createSpace(""));
248    }
249
250  }
251
252  @SuppressWarnings("null")
253  @Override
254  public Stream<Node> getNodesAsStream() {
255    return Stream.concat(Stream.of(getDocument()),
256        StreamSupport.stream(getDocument().getDescendants().spliterator(), false));
257  }
258
259  @Override
260  @NonNull
261  public List<InsertAnchorNode> getInserts() {
262    return getInserts(insert -> true);
263  }
264
265  /**
266   * Retrieve all insert statements that are contained within this markup text
267   * that match the provided filter.
268   *
269   * @param filter
270   *          a filter used to identify matching insert statements
271   * @return the matching insert statements
272   */
273  @Override
274  @NonNull
275  public List<InsertAnchorNode> getInserts(@NonNull Predicate<InsertAnchorNode> filter) {
276    InsertAnchorExtension.InsertVisitor visitor = new InsertAnchorExtension.InsertVisitor(filter);
277    visitor.visitChildren(getDocument());
278    return visitor.getInserts();
279  }
280
281  @Override
282  public String toString() {
283    return AstCollectingVisitor.asString(getDocument());
284  }
285}
